text.language: Agioc o~ Yeoc: a~gioc ic,uroc: a~gioc a~yanatoc: o~ c~taurwyic di /~mac: e~le/~con /~mac.
Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was crucified for us, have mercy upon us.
Allah Kudus, Mahakuasa Kudus, Kekal Kudus, yang disalib karena kami, kasihanilah kami.
قُدّوسٌ اللَّهُ، قُدّوسٌ القَويُّ، قُدّوسٌ الحَيُّ الَّذي لا يَموتُ، الَّذي صُلِبَ عنّا ارحَمْنا.
